item.title: My Journey in Architecture
item.description: After two years of working on an architectural project, it is ready to see the light of day. Read about my exploration of an architect’s work, starting at the sketch phase, and ending with a fully-working 2D and 3D model ready to construct.

item.title: Choosing the right element â€“ accessible web design
item.description: Accessible design means thinking beyond the average user and ensuring that every human being can meaningfully interact with software. This article explores using semantic HTML to make webpages screen reader-friendly.

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: This is my first ever post. It is mostly just a test of the blogging platform. You won’t find any interesting content here.
